explains: adv. 就个人而言；亲自地，本人地；当面地，直接地；个别地，单个地；私人地，私下里；无礼地，冒犯地
wordGroup: personally speaking 就个人来说，就自己而言

sentences.en: I write personally to each inquirer.
sentences.cn: 我亲自给每位问讯者回信。

sentences.en: I personally think it's a rotten idea.
sentences.cn: 我个人认为这是个馊主意。

sentences.en: Personally, I prefer the second option.
sentences.cn: 就我个人而言，我倾向第二种选择。
